publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2274 Rosie Kane: World Wheelchair Curling Championships 2005â€”That the Parliament wishes the Scotland team well in the World Wheelchair Curling Championships 2005, currently being held at Braehead, Glasgow.

S2M-2274 World Wheelchair Curling Championships 2005 (lodged on 18 January 2005) Dr Elaine Murray*, Colin Fox*, Elaine Smith*, Mike Pringle*, Nora Radcliffe*, Robin Harper*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Campbell Martin*, Mr Bruce McFee*, Frances Curran*, Carolyn Leckie*, Eleanor Scott*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*
